fields.title: Harris 1988 Denver Senior Citizen Survey, study no. 884007

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This survey attempts to measure senior citizen's knowledge of, and their need for a variety of health and human services. Variables include person to turn to for help, knowledge of social service agency, identifying services currently receiving, living arrangement, person taking care of respondent, need for assistance, visits with relatives, and outlook for the future.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Telephone survey. Sample of Coloradans 60 years of age or older.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-884007;
